content.title: Thousands of topics to add to myFT
content.body: Discover topics of interest more easily on thousands of concepts. Then you can track topics most important to you in myFT.
content.imageAlt: Illustration of the "Companies" page, showing an "Added" button next to the page heading

content.title: Gift 10 articles a month to non-subscribers for free

content.title: Gift 10 articles a month to non-subscribers for free
content.imageAlt: Illustration of the Gift Article button in article pages

content.title: Gift article
content.body: Share 10 articles a month with non-subscribers, who can read them free. Look for the email icon at the top of articles.
content.imageAlt: Illustration of the Gift Article button in article pages

content.title: New charting tools, macromaps and easier currency comparison

content.title: Markets Data

content.title: Email Briefings
content.body: You can now manage your email briefing subscriptions in myFT. We’ll be adding to this in the coming months.

content.title: You can now add, edit and track investments on all your devices
content.imageAlt: Illustration of the FT Portfolio page

content.title: You can now add, edit and track investments on all your devices

content.title: Updated Portfolio tool
content.body: Add, edit and track investments on all your devices. If you’re not quite ready to make the move, you can still access the old Portfolio while we put the finishing touches on the new tool.
content.imageAlt: Illustration of the FT Portfolio page
